name: Under the Moon (rollcreators)
description:
Description

Defend from meteor moon rain and resque the population of the Earth.

Be careful, keep an eye on the energy levels of the shields. These shields protect the Eatrh from the Moon.

Control

LMB - choose the earth or space cell and build towers

Goal

Resque more than 50% of the population or destroy the Moon

Resourses

Using soundtrack from:

https://freesound.org/

Credits

Andrey Elisafenko - Game Designer, Artist
Zhuravlev Vechislav - Developer
